original_text: Therefore the heaven over you is stayed from dew, and the earth is stayed from her fruit.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희로 말미암아 하늘은 이슬을 그쳤고 땅은 산물을 그쳤으며

sentences.original_text: Therefore the heaven over you is stayed from dew
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희 위의 하늘은 이슬을 그치게 하고

sentences.original_text: and the earth is stayed from her fruit
